txt.en:
'Good day, traveller.

'Word was sent from Dor-en-Ernil. Work has begun in the restoration of the lighthouse that guides the Bay of Belfalas.

'All able bodied individuals who can help are encouraged to volunteer.

'Erchar awaits you at the beacon of Dol Brannor. He should have more information for you.'
'What is it? Is there trouble at Barad Rill?\n\n'We have vowed to protect these lands and shall not waver!'
Lainil has asked you to report to the beacon of Dol Brannor to aid in the restoration of Barad Rill.
Lainil wants you to speak to Erchar at Dol Brannor for more information on the restoration of Barad Rill.\n\nDol Brannor is west of Linhir in Dor-en-Ernil.
Talk to Erchar at Dol Brannor
